SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(a.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT ,a.RPC_VHC_ID ,a.REP_ROUT_ID ,a.ALLOC_NO ,a.COR_ID ,a.GRP_VHC_ID ,a.GRP_VHC_NO ,a.GRP_DRV_ID ,a.GRP_DRV_NM ,a.RPC_VHC_NO ,a.RPC_DRV_ID ,a.RPC_DRV_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(a.RPC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RPC_DT ,a.OCR_TM ,a.RPC_TM ,a.GPS_X ,a.GPS_Y ,a.TM_X ,a.TM_Y ,a.DETAILS ,a.ROUT_ID ,b.INCDNT_TYPE ,b.REP_ROUT_NM FROM sbrt.BRT_RPC_VHC_INFO a LEFT JOIN sbrt.BRT_INCDNT_INFO b ON a.OPER_DT = b.OPER_DT AND a.GRP_VHC_ID = b.VHC_ID
AND OCR_DTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || RPC_VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND OCR_DTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND RPC_VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY OCR_DTM
select DATE_FORMAT(OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OCR_DTM, RPC_VHC_ID from BRT_RPC_VHC_INFO
select DATE_FORMAT(OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT, GRP_VHC_ID from BRT_RPC_VHC_INFO

select VHC_ID, VHC_NO from BMS_VHC_MST
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')

select DRV_ID, DRV_NM from BMS_DRV_MST
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
